metadata.description: Historical South China Sea incidents (2012-2024) for model calibration and validation

incidents.name: Scarborough Shoal Standoff Begins
incidents.description: Chinese vessels blocked Philippine Navy from arresting Chinese fishermen

incidents.name: HYSY-981 Oil Rig Crisis
incidents.description: China placed oil rig in disputed waters; Vietnamese vessels rammed by Chinese ships
incidents.outcome: Rig removed after completing operations; 6 Vietnamese injured

incidents.name: Arbitration Ruling
incidents.description: UNCLOS tribunal rules in favor of Philippines; China rejects ruling
incidents.outcome: China continues operations; Philippines gains legal victory

incidents.name: Reed Bank Incident
incidents.description: Chinese fishing vessel rammed and sank Philippine fishing boat; 22 Filipino fishermen abandoned at sea
incidents.outcome: Vietnam rescued fishermen; Philippines protested; incident strain relations

incidents.name: Whitsun Reef Militia Swarm
incidents.description: 220 Chinese militia vessels assembled at Whitsun Reef in Philippines EEZ
incidents.outcome: Most vessels dispersed after diplomatic protests; some remained

incidents.name: Second Thomas Shoal Laser Incident
incidents.description: Chinese Coast Guard used military-grade laser against Philippine vessel conducting resupply
incidents.outcome: Temporary blinding of Filipino crew; Philippines filed protest

incidents.name: Ayungin Shoal Blockade
incidents.description: Chinese Coast Guard blocked Philippine Navy resupply mission to BRP Sierra Madre
incidents.outcome: Mission delayed; eventual resupply after negotiations

incidents.name: Second Thomas Shoal Water Cannon Attack
incidents.description: Chinese vessels used water cannons against Philippine boats during resupply mission
incidents.outcome: Four Filipino sailors injured; Philippines summoned Chinese ambassador

incidents.name: Ayungin Shoal Collision
incidents.description: Chinese Coast Guard rammed Philippine Navy inflatable boat; sailor lost thumb in incident
incidents.outcome: Serious injury; Philippines considering invoking MDT with US
